```
(define x (cons (list a b) (list c d)))
(define y (list e f)) 
```

```
(define (append x y)
  (if (null? x)
      y
      (cons (car x) (append (cdr x) y)))) 
```

```
> (define x (list 'a 'b))
x      
> (define y (list 'c 'd))
y
> (define z (append x y))
z     
> z
(a b c d)
```

```
> (define w (append! x y))
w
> w
(a b c d)
```

```
> (eq? x y)
#t
> (eq? x z)
#f
> (eq? y z)
#f 
```
